string-array.name: mailHeader
string-array.item: WERE HERE FOR YOUR EXTENDED WARRANTY

string-array.name: mailInfo
string-array.item: ITS COMING ITS COMING ITS COMING ITS LOOKING AT ME
I JUST WANNA KNOW IF SOMEONES LIVING IN YOUR WALLS
SOMEDAY YOULL GO THROUGH THE RAIN
SOMEDAY YOULL FEED ON A TREE FROG
THIS ORDEAL THE TRIAL TO SURVIVEEEEEEEEE
MOUNTAINS DONT GIVE BACK WHAT THEY TAKE
TIME WILL COME TO SOFTLY LAY ME DOOWN
